original_title: 実録! ! ほんとにあった恐怖の投稿映像 27
overview: The 27th installment of a popular series that carefully selects horror videos that have been posted and introduces all 10 episodes! ! So far, I've introduced strange phenomena that are reflected in home videos of ordinary households, and ghosts that have slipped into surveillance cameras. This time too, in "Another Space", when I was turning the camera in a certain park, a cat passed by, and at that time, I encountered a very strange phenomenon.
title: Actual Record! Real Horror Posted Video 27
